author: poojaranjan
content:
According to EIP-1, ERC is one of the four Standard Track EIPs. 
IMHO like other Standard Track EIPs, the best way to document is EIP-123 instead of ERC-123. 

EIP-1559 is Core but not documented as Core-1559. Also, EIP-2124 is Networking Type but never referred to as Networking-2124. I fail to understand why only ERC be documented as ERC-20?

The community has been calling it an ERC, which is okay, but I think, for documentation purposes, documenting as EIP-123 is a good practice.
